name: Taroumaru
description:
When played: Create 4 Taroumaru's Savings and distribute them evenly in your deck.
After you have played 2 Taroumaru's Savings cards: Discard this card and summon 1 Taroumaru Enraged.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Create 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K2001]</color> and distribute them evenly in your deck.\nAfter <color=#FFFFFFFF>you have played 2 $[K2001] cards:</color> Discard this card and summon 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1021]</color>.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When played:</color> Create 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Taroumaru's Savings</color> and distribute them evenly in your deck.\nAfter <color=#FFFFFFFF>you have played 2 Taroumaru's Savings cards:</color> Discard this card and summon 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Taroumaru Enraged</color>.
storytext:
The boss of Komore Teahouse, with whom all staff members are said to have signed a "contract"...
Few people know that back in the day, Taroumaru would accompany powerful ninja of the Shuumatsuban, striving in service of the Yashiro Commission...
